title: Skewness Explorer
description: Interactive MicroSim where students classify distributions as symmetric, skewed left, or skewed right by examining histograms. Features real-world contexts (household income, exam scores, heights, wait times, retirement ages), visual hints highlighting tail directions, a classification streak counter, and adjustable skewness slider for custom exploration.
creator: Dan McCreary
